title: Citi First Quarter 2014 Fixed Income Investor Review
summary: New York - John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer, and Eric Aboaf, Treasurer, will conduct the Citigroup first quarter 2014 Fixed Income Investor Review at 10 a.m. (ET) on Thursday, April 17, 2014. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-1: Citi First Quarter 2014 Fixed Income Investor Review
tag-2: New York – John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer, and Eric Aboaf, Treasurer, will conduct the Citigroup first quarter 2014 Fixed Income Investor Review at 10 a.m. (ET) on Thursday, April 17, 2014. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The webcast and presentation materials will be available at https://www.citigroup.com/global/investors/. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available after the call.
tag-4: To dial-in to the live teleconference, please dial:
tag-5: US & Canada: (800) 309-5794 International Callers: (706) 902-3256d Conference code: 3587288
tag-6: Telephone lines will open at 9:45 a.m. (ET).
tag-7: A telephonic replay of the call will be available beginning approximately two hours after the event until Thursday, May 1, 2014, by calling (855) 859-2056 (U.S. and Canada callers) or (404) 537-3406 (for international callers). Conference code: 3587288.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-9: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
